document.full_text: samsung electronics filed its own u.s. lawsuit against apple, accusing the ipad maker of infringing 10 patents in an escalation of the dispute over tablet and mobile technology.
document.title: samsung launches patent counterattack against apple
lines_and_colors: samsung electronics filed its own u.s. lawsuit against apple, accusing the ipad maker of infringing 10 patents in an escalation of the dispute over tablet and mobile technology.
